RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: R T'S GEM close from the start off the inside, pressured the leader from the outside in the run up the backstretch, challenged that one and took over far turn, clear into the stretch, extended that advantage past the furlong marker, held late under steady handling. ENTITLEMENT off a step slow, continued to lag the first five furlongs, saved ground through the second turn, shifted out for room, rallied from between foes to finish up willingly to gain the place while closing the gap on the winner. WORLD OF HURT also lacked any early foot, began to advance after a half, four wide when moving closest to the winner into the stretch, continued to pursue that one past the furlong marker, was still making slow progress on that one late when nailed for the place in the final strides while outside the runner up. MOR KISSES five wide into the first turn when with the main body, moved closer after a half, remained within striking distance into the stretch, flattened out a bit in the late going to finish up evenly. SCARLET STORM raced within striking distance for five furlongs, came up empty for the stretch run while in the three path. JUST A WIN one paced while saving ground, moved out for the drive, also found lacking in the stretch run. RIPTIDE ROSE took command from along the inside after the start, showed the way through the first turn and up the backstretch, faltered when headed by the winner in the far turn. SIKARA SIKARA was never a serious threat. CHICKIETOWN STAR stopped after a half, jogged in far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Riptide Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command after start, pace, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: World of Hurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w into lane, chased winner 1/8,caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlet Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Sikara Sikara
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a serious threat

ENTRY.NAME: Chickietown Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: stopped after half, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: R T's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start off rail, pressed, took over, larger lead, held

ENTRY.NAME: Mor Kisses
ENTRY.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Rovinsky Kirk
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w into first turn, closer 2nd turn, flattened out bit late

ENTRY.NAME: Entitlement
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,lagged,rail 2nd turn,traffic 3/16,moved out,willing

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIELD OF VISION broke with the field, fell back off the pace inside, swung out to be four wide into the lane when moving to challenge, bid, kicked well clear. OURPERFECTPRINCE prompted the pace outside for three furlongs, three wide bid between horses into the lane, proved no match for the winner the final furlong, clearly second best. DIAL UNCLE JOEY pressed the issue from between foes, had little for the top two in the drive, lasted for the show. RAZZ off the pace while racing outside, five wide exiting the turn, went evenly to the wire in lacking a significant closing kick. SMOOTH RIVER last to leave, lacked speed of the inside, improved position through the lane without posing a serious threat. STORMIN SUNDAY fell back to trail after the start, picked off a couple of tiring rivals without making an impact. ALL OF US in mid pack for three furlongs, backed up through the stretch. ASTROLOGYSPROTEGE narrowly set the pace along the inside, gave way through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Field of Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with field, back off pace, swung 4w into lane, bid, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Stormin Sunday
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, picked off couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth River
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed, improved, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Astrologysprotege
ENTRY.COMMENT: narrowly set early pace inside, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Uncle Joey
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between foes, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: All of Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack for three furlongs, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Razz
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace outside, 5w into lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Ourperfectprince
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace outside, 3w turn, bid, no match stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 16500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 6 Allowed 5 lbs. Clai ming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NATE'S ATTACK moved when pressing the leader, continued to apply pressure in the two path for a half, dueled into and through the far turn, pulled away the final furlong while being kept to task. SEEHOSS set the early pace along the inside, dueled the middle part while remaining closest to the inside, could not match strides with the winner the final furlong, remained clear of his other rival. I'M D'CAT fell back to trail the top top two soon after the start, failed to mount a rally. HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Nate's Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out, pressed 2p, dueled into far turn, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Seehoss
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, dueled, second best

ENTRY.NAME: I'm d'Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, failed to rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 6, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 6, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOUIS LE GRANDE outrun in the early going despite being ridden along, advanced three wide through the second bend under continued brisk hand urging, roused when straightened for home, late bid, proved best. BODE'S LIGHT away in good order, moved closer before a half, bid second turn, stretch duel, led late, nailed by the winner. SCREENPLAY chased the early leader off the inside, took over far turn, dueled through upper stretch and past the furlong marker, weakened in the late going, finished up best of the rest. TROPHY DADDY underwent a shoe repair in the paddock, last away, four wide first turn, continued outside, four wide again through the second bend when moving closer, flattened out in the drive. APPLEWOOD void of speed, improved position the third quarter while racing toward the inside, also failed to sustain that advance through the stretch. TAPPED OUT within striking distance early, had little left for the drive. HERE COMES MAGIC in the second flight for six furlongs, weakened when the real running began at the head of the lane. MATH MAN lacked speed, continued back while four wide into the lane, lacked a closing kick. MEAN CRUISER failed to menace while five wide into the stretch. BLUSHINSTREETDEVIL sprinted clear after the start, showed the way up the backstretch, stopped when headed far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Tapped Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, had little left for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Bode's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer before a half, bid, stretch duel, led late, nailed late

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Cruiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace while 5w 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Applewood
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, improved third quarter, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Math Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w into lane, lacked kick

ENTRY.NAME: Trophy Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: shoe repair, 4w 1st turn, again second when closer, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Blushinstreetdevil
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear early, stopped far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Screenplay
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, took over, dueled, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight off rail, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Louis Le Grande
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early while asked, 3w advance 2nd bend, set down, in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 85. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 6, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 6, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASHEW unhurried early, continued to be outrun through the turn, came five wide for the drive when beginning to advance, stalled a bit inside the furlong marker, late surge to be just up at the wire while remaining widest of the first flight. KATIE'S KARAT broke alertly, vied between horses onto the main track, dueled into and through the turn, between horses again into the lane, second duel past the furlong marker, refused to yield to that rival in the run to the wire despite being headed, led late, nipped at the wire while proving game for the place. ANGELA'S CELERITY with the pace three wide out of the chute, fell back to stalk outside, rebid three wide turning into the stretch, dueled outside the runner up past the furlong marker, outgamed at the wire while between the top two. JERSEY HOTTIE one paced behind the leaders, continued to chase the first flight into the stretch, had little for the top three the final furlong. GOODNIGHTLOVING off a step slow, moved up to mid pack the middle part then had little for the stretch run. TAYLOR'S SECRET with the pace out of the chute, dueled into the turn, faltered in the drive. START WELL failed to threaten in remaining back.

ENTRY.NAME: Taylor's Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace inside,dueled rail into turn, faltered drive

ENTRY.NAME: Goodnightloving
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, moved up, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's Karat
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk alertly, vied, dueled 2p, long drive,nipped late,game 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Hottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, no threat to top three

ENTRY.NAME: Angela's Celerity
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, outside bid into lane, dueled, outgamed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Start Well
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Cashew
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, 5w into lane, late surge, just up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UP N GONE last to leave, continued unhurried early, began to move into the far turn, steered out and swept up five wide to challenge into the stretch, put a head in front when straightened for home, and drove well clear. SYVESTAR moved closer before a half in the three path, maintained a forward position through the final turn while remaining off the inside, challenged briefly when four wide and inside the winner into the lane, proved no match for that one, edged clear for the second spot. BEAUDEAN broke very sharp, narrowly set the pace in along the inside, larger lead midway on the second turn, vied into the stretch, gave ground grudgingly to the runner up until late while also proving no match for the winner. RACY BILLE in the second flight along the inside, continued to save ground while being asked along second turn, briefly lodged a mild bid in upper stretch then weakened. LIKE THIS moved up to press the pace in the two path for almost six furlongs and faltered. MARVINS' POSSE went one paced outside, had little for the stretch run. MECKES PRIORITY five wide into the first turn, began to weaken in the far bend. SEA OF LIGHT finished early, well back. UNCLE HUTCH rank while four wide into the first turn, stopped after a half, jogged in far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Racy Bille
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside,asked along second turn,mild rail bid, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sea of Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished early, well back

ENTRY.NAME: Like This
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2p, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Beaudean
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, pace inside, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Up N Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: last way, unhurried, swept up 5w late 2nd turn, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Syvestar
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer before a half 3w, 4w bid btwn foes into lane,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Marvins' Posse
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced outside, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Hutch
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank, four wide into first turn, stopped, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Meckes Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w into first turn, began to weaken far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 16000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 6, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 6, 2023 All owed 5 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIAS MOONBEAM in the second flight while saving ground, angled out late in the final turn to be three wide into the lane, chased the leader past the furlong marker,late push to be up in time while outside that rival at the wire. COOL INDIVIDUAL lacked any early foot inside, continued to save ground into the lane, late run up the wire to finish up willingly. MASTERLY away in good order, set or forced the pace three wide, shook off the other speed to be clear in upper stretch, extended that advantage past the furlong marker then weakened late to be nailed by the top two in the final strides after drifting out a bit. FLASHING ANGELBABY vied up front along the inside, fell back a bit far turn, went evenly through the lane. SERMONONTHEMOUNT settled in mid pack, five wide turning for home, lacked a serious rally. INDIMAAJ with the early pace between foes, continued to vie up the backstretch, dueled second turn then weakened through the lane. DEALIN' STELEN broke out and steadied to be last away, remained back in failing to menace. BET AGAIN tucked in a bit to be three wide and in the second flight, tired in the drive. FREEDOMFI was finished after half.

ENTRY.NAME: Mias Moonbeam
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, angled out 3w late 2nd, late push, up

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Darren J. Dworak, Renee Dworak & Angela Holthaus

ENTRY.NAME: Sermononthemount
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, five wide into the lane, lacked serious rally

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Individual
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, saved ground, late run up rail

ENTRY.NAME: Flashing Angelbaby
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front inside, fell back, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Dealin' Stelen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, steadied, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Indimaaj
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace between foes, dueled 2nd turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Freedomfi
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished after half

ENTRY.NAME: Masterly
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced pace 3w, clear, faltered late while drifting bit

ENTRY.NAME: Bet Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: tucked in 3w first, mid pack, tired drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERIOUSLY SAM forwardly placed out of the chute, moved up to duel outside the early leader into the turn, took over entering the stretch, steadily drew off, ridden out. MARDI GRAS ALARM broke alertly, showed the way up the backstretch, responded when the winner challenged into the turn, dueled inside that one, proved no match in the drive, remained clear for the place. ASHLEY'S GIRL fell well back to trail early, continued to lag through the turn inside, made a late run up the rail to narrowly grab the show spot at the wire. GURKHA GOLD (IRE) also lacked early foot, steered out to be five wide into the lane, late interest midtrack to narrowly miss the show.l. NAVAGATIONALBEACON chased the top two off the inside, had little for that pair through the lane, nipped late for the show. CAJUN TWO STEP never seriously menaced. QUALITY BOW forwardly placed early, began a steady retreat before a half. FLASHYBOY'S LILSIS in mid pack, floated out six wide turning for home, tired in the run to the wire. KAPPA HILL also steadily faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Ashley's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell well back, late run up rail

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Two Step
ENTRY.COMMENT: never seriously menace

ENTRY.NAME: Quality Bow
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Kappa Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Navagationalbeacon
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top two, nipped late for show

ENTRY.NAME: Gurkha Gold (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, steered 5w into lane, late run, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Flashyboy's Lilsis
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack,floated 6w into lane, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Seriously Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward out of chute, dueled, took over, clear, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Mardi Gras Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, dueled turn inside, no match
